meanings.definition: Any of a large group of organic compounds occurring in foods and living tissues and including sugars, starch, and cellulose.
meanings.sent1: Carbohydrates provide energy for our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Fruits and vegetables are good sources of carbohydrates.
meanings.sent3: Why did the carbohydrate go to the gym? To get pumped up!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as carbohydrates on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The carbohydrates danced in the sunlight, fueling life around them.

meanings.definition: A food, such as bread, rice, or potatoes, that is rich in carbohydrates.
meanings.sent1: My favorite meal includes a variety of carbohydrates.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often consume carbohydrates before a big game.
meanings.sent3: The potato told the bread, 'We make a great team, full of carbohydrates!'
meanings.sent4: The buffet table was a carbohydrate paradise, tempting all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the room, a comforting cloud of carbohydrates.
